tagline: This is for preparation of the C# exam 70-483
body:
# 70-483

**This repo is designed to host all the working code examples that I used while studying for the Microsoft C# exam number 70-483. Feel free to use this and as the language progresses contact me and we can fork changes back into the master. This exam measures your ability to accomplish the technical tasks listed below.**

1. Managing Program Flow
1. Create and Use Types
1. Debug and Implement Security
1. Implement Data Access


**I hope these help**
**~Alex**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
